content.title: ⏳ 48 Hours Left! 90% Off AI & Data Science pack – No Second Chances!
content.creator:
Eduonix Learning Solutions
March 5, 2025
content.content:
🚀 THANK YOU, BACKERS!

We're 1610% funded, and it’s all because of YOU! Your overwhelming support has taken the Data Science & Gen AI Programming Launchpad 2025  to the next level! 🙌But we’re not stopping yet—we’re aiming for our $10K stretch goal! 🎯
💥 STRETCH GOAL ALERT – $10K MILESTONE! 💥
We’re just inches away from hitting $10,000 in funding, and when we do, EVERY backer will unlock 3 Exclusive Bonus Projects at NO extra cost! Let’s make it happen! 🔥
💥 NEW PLEDGE UNLOCKED – ONLY FOR THE FASTEST 5! 💥
We just dropped a super-exclusive pledge for the first 5 backers ONLY! 🚀 Don't miss out on this once-in-a-lifetime deal!
Data Science & Gen AI E- degree Pack
💰 Offer Price: $99 (Original: $999 – Save 90%!)
🎁 What All You Will Get in Here!!!
✔ 🎓 1 E-Degree on Data Science
✔ 🤖 1 E-Degree on GENAI
🛠 Master the Top AI & Data Science Tools:
🐍 Python, 🔗 LangChain, 🤖 RAGs, ☁ AWS, ☁ Azure, 🧠 OpenAI, and more!
⏳ Time is Ticking…
This campaign closes in 48 hours—once it's gone, it's gone FOREVER. No extensions. No second chances.
🔗 Act NOW & Claim Your Spot Before It's Too Late!

content.title: Thank You! 🚀 Get Ready for an Incredible AI & Data Science Masterclass
content.creator:
Eduonix Learning Solutions
February 19, 2025
content.content:
🙌 A Big Thank You to Our Amazing Backers!
We’re incredibly grateful for your support on our Kickstarter campaign, The Data Science & Gen AI Programming Launchpad 2025! Your belief in this mission drives our passion for making AI and data-driven problem-solving accessible to all.
Just for you, we’ve added a new pledge – theLive AI & Data Science Masterclass, where you'll get two months of weekly sessions packed with hands-on insights into AI, Python, Excel, and data-driven decision-making—all delivered in an engaging, step-by-step format. This is a limited and exclusive pledge, designed to give you direct access to expert-led learning like never before. We can’t wait to embark on this journey with you!
🚀 This is an exclusive, limited-time pledge! Spots are filling up fast
Claim Your Spot Before It’s Gone!
We also have an exciting stretch goal lined up, which will add even more hands-on projects to enhance your AI learning experience and give you practical exposure to real-world applications.
🔥 We’re close to unlocking our stretch goal! Help us reach the target and unlock exciting new AI projects
Pledge now and be part of this milestone! 🚀
